business_uid.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the business

external_review_site_url.description: Specifies the external review site URL where the review will be shared.

external_review_site_display_name.description: Specifies the display name of the external review site receiving the review.

display_review_sharing_consent.description: Enables the client to decide whether their review is shared with that external review site.

platform_id.description: The ID of the external review platform (1=Google, 2=Facebook)

platform_name.description: The name of the external review platform

platform_params.description: Platform-specific parameters needed to properly route the review
